system.description:
This spell causes one or more humans, demihumans, or human-like monsters (see @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.advanced-fantasy-referees-rules.JournalEntry.EbekC1qu7IWkKNuL.JournalEntryPage.qKCtpqyJ3bLM4QhB#persons]{Persons}) to be paralysed if they fail a saving throw versus spells. It may be cast in two ways:

  1. Against an individual: The target’s saving throw is penalised by –2.

  2. Against a group: [[/r 1d4]] individuals in the group are targeted.

Restrictions: Humanoids of greater than 4+1 HD (see @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.advanced-fantasy-referees-rules.JournalEntry.EbekC1qu7IWkKNuL.JournalEntryPage.9J6NYLwxAZd4yWBj#hit-dice-(hd)]{Hit Point modifiers}) and undead are not affected.
